creator: gus.heck@olin.edu
text:
So I decided to back off the 1.6 alpha thing since it had failing tests.

I had the cvs commands in my shell history so I checked out the -r ANT_151_FINAL

And it has different failing tests!! Surely it wasn't released with failing tests??

Anyway here's the output for the test run:

jakarta-ant]# JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/j2sdk1.4.1_01/ ./build.sh test
Buildfile: build.xml

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: It looks as if the tests require java to be in the PATH.

creator: conor@apache.org
text: Fixed - please test against the 1.5 CVS branch (or HEAD for 1.6)
